short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your EVM tools in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This browser extension will supercharge ⚡your Ethereum experience.

▶️ Adds "Decode Calldata" button to Etherscan tx pages: view complex transaction params in human-readable form, right in the side panel!
▶️ "sk": type this in your address bar & press tab: 
1. Allows to instantly open any Address / ENS or Transaction across 100s of EVM explorers and dashboards.
2. Paste any calldata to open it in the Universal Calldata Decoder on swiss-knife.xyz
